items.summary: Engel, 54 years old at the time of his death, was a resident of the Gaza border community of Kibbutz Nir Oz. Sonthaya Oakkharasri was a Thai agricultural worker who had worked for eight years in farms across Israel and dreamed of building his own in Thailand

items.summary: The organization is still an 'asset' from the prime minister's point of view. Instead of helping establish a new diplomatic order alongside the UAE and Saudi Arabia, Netanyahu is enabling Qatar and Turkey to restore Hamas' stronghold in Gaza

items.title: Netanyahu and his allies resume their war on Israel's judicial system
items.summary: Now that the hostages have been rescued and the war ended, it is time to liberate the country from the stranglehold of Netanyahu, his government and the power structure that he built around himself. All the guardians of democracy must rally to this cause

items.title: Israelis don't deserve opposition MK Benny Gantz
items.summary: Gantz's model would have worked had all parties set aside political rivalries and been willing to make concessions for the sake of coexistence in Israel. Since we have not gotten that, we should salute Gantz as we observe the political decline of the man who embodies our entire tragedy
